attributes.action: Save the post office from relocation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The post office is relocating its premises against my wish. I have already found a buyer and informed the po about it but they have decided to move it anyway.

rejection.details: It is not clear what action you are requesting the government take. Please rephrase your petition, providing more detail, and resubmit.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
